metadata.Title: CVE-2014-5356 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description:
OpenStack Image Registry and Delivery Service (Glance) before 2013.2.4, 2014.x before 2014.1.3, and Juno before Juno-3, when using the V2 API, does not properly enforce the image_size_cap configuration option, which allows remote authenticated users to cause a denial of service (disk consumption) by uploading a large image.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-5356` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

glance - 1:2014.1.2-0ubuntu1.1
glance-api - 1:2014.1.2-0ubuntu1.1
glance-common - 1:2014.1.2-0ubuntu1.1
glance-registry - 1:2014.1.2-0ubuntu1.1
python-glance - 1:2014.1.2-0ubuntu1.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: glance package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1:2014.1.2-0ubuntu1.1').
